articles.title: Riot Games sues Mobile Legends: Bang Bang for plagiarism—again - Dot Esports
articles.description: This is the second time Riot has sued Shanghai-based developer Moonton Games.
articles.content:
Riot Games is suing the Shanghai-based developer of Mobile Legends: Bang Bang for plagiarising Wild Rift, the mobile version of League of Legends.
Since launching a mobile version of the popular MOB… [+1644 chars]
